about_the_game:
Viral Execution: Survive the Ultimate Challenge!
In a world devastated by a deadly virus, only the most cunning and brave will survive.
Welcome to Viral Execution, a first-person shooter where ammunition is limited and enemies are innumerable.
Do you have what it takes to overcome this extreme challenge?

The Story
Humanity is on the brink of extinction.
A virus has transformed most of the population into fierce enemies, and only a few heroes are left to fight.
You are one of them. With barely any ammo and your wits about you, you must face hordes of enemies and fearsome mini-bosses.

Game mechanics:.
The path to survival is brutal:
Start the level.
Eliminate enemies.
Die.
Repeat......

The Challenge.
Each level is a lesson in trial and error. Until you recognize the best way to eliminate all enemies, manage your ammo and collect antidotes, you will not be able to advance.
Will you be able to master each level and unlock the next one?

Features:


  • Ten intense levels: Each designed to test your skills to the max.
  • Five difficulty modes: From beginner to expert, for a challenge to suit you.
  • 21 unique characters: Choose your hero and fight against the apocalypse.
  • Epic boss battles: Face the most challenging bosses that will push you to the limit.
  • Scarce ammo: Manage every bullet carefully, every shot counts.
  • First or third person: Play from the perspective you prefer.
  • Weapon customization: Upgrade and adapt your arsenal for each battle.

Ready for the Challenge?
Complete all ten available levels and prove that you can survive this incredible challenge - download it now on Steam and start your fight for survival!

Viral Execution: The game that will test your skill and endurance!

name: Viral Execution

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Dual-core CPU with SSE3 (Intel® Pentium® D 3GHz / AMD Athlon™ 64 X2 4200) or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD graphics
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Specs to be rated. These are just aproximations, actual results may vary.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel i3 2nd gen.
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Specs to be rated. These are just aproximations, actual results may vary.

reviews:
“Shooter exigente muy bien trabajado (cinematicas, animaciones, ect) para ser un juego que tan solo cuesta 5 euros en España. Por lo que cuesta merece mucho la pena.”
Comunidad en Español
short_description: If you like challenges, complete the ten levels available in its five difficulty modes to overcome the objective proposed by Viral Execution. Manage your ammunition well and get all the antidotes before the time runs out.
supported_languages:
English, Spanish - Latin America*, Spanish - Spain*
*languages with full audio support
